law.catch_line: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a corporation, limited liability company, or p...

text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a corporation, limited liability company, or partnership shall hold a permit issued by the Board before the corporation, limited liability company, or partnership may operate a business through which architecture is practiced.
A corporation may provide architectural services for itself or for an affiliated corporation without a permit issued by the Board.
